Package com.paiondata.aristotle.mapper.impl

Class NodeMapperImpl

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.mapper.impl.NodeMapperImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeMapper
@Repository public class NodeMapperImpl extends Object implements NodeMapper
Repository class for executing Cypher queries related to nodes in Neo4j.

      @Autowired public NodeMapperImpl(org.neo4j.driver.Driver driver, NodeExtractor nodeExtractor, RelationShipExtractor relationShipExtractor)

      nodeExtractor - the NodeExtractor instance

  • Method Details

    • getNodeByUuid

      public NodeVO getNodeByUuid(String uuid)
      Retrieves a node by its UUID.

      Constructs a Cypher query to match a node by its UUID and return it. Executes the Cypher query within a read transaction using the Neo4j session. Extracts the node details from the query result and returns a NodeVO object. If no node is found, returns null.

      Specified by:
      getNodeByUuid in interface NodeMapper
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the node to retrieve
      Returns:
      a NodeVO object representing the node, or null if no node is found

    • createNode

      public NodeVO createNode(String graphUuid, String nodeUuid, String relationUuid, String currentTime, NodeDTO nodeDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates a new node and associates it with a graph.

      Constructs a Cypher query to match a graph by its UUID, update its update time,
      create a new node with the provided details, and establish a relationship between the graph and the new node. Executes the Cypher query using the provided transaction. Extracts the node details from the query result and returns a NodeVO object.

      Specified by:
      createNode in interface NodeMapper
      Parameters:
      graphUuid - the UUID of the graph to which the node will be added
      nodeUuid - the UUID of the new node
      relationUuid - the UUID of the relationship between the graph and the new node
      currentTime - the current timestamp for creation and update times
      nodeDTO - the DTO containing the properties of the new node
      tx - the Neo4j transaction to execute the Cypher query
      Returns:
      a NodeVO object representing the newly created node

    • getRelationByGraphUuid

      public GetRelationDTO getRelationByGraphUuid(String uuid, Map<String,String> properties, Integer pageNumber, Integer pageSize)
      Retrieves the relationships and nodes associated with a graph by its UUID.

      Constructs a Cypher query to match a graph by its UUID and find its related nodes and relationships. Optionally filters the nodes based on the provided properties. Executes the Cypher query within a read transaction using the Neo4j session. Extracts the node and relationship details from the query results and
      returns them in a GetRelationDTO object.

      Specified by:
      getRelationByGraphUuid in interface NodeMapper
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph
      properties - a map of properties to filter the nodes (optional)
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      Returns:
      a GetRelationDTO object containing the list of relationships and nodes

    • kDegreeExpansion

      public GraphVO kDegreeExpansion(String graphUuid, String nodeUuid, Integer k)
      Expands the graph from a given node to a specified depth.

      This method calculates the maximum depth of the graph and ensures that the expansion does not exceed this depth. If the specified depth `k` is negative, it will be set to the maximum depth. The method uses a breadth-first search (BFS) approach to expand the graph and collect nodes and relationships up to the specified depth.

      Specified by:
      kDegreeExpansion in interface NodeMapper
      Parameters:
      graphUuid - The UUID of the graph.
      nodeUuid - The UUID of the starting node.
      k - The desired depth of expansion.
      Returns:
      A GraphVO object containing the expanded nodes and relationships.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - If the starting node with the given UUID does not exist in the graph.

    • bindGraphNodeToGraphNode

      public void bindGraphNodeToGraphNode(String uuid1, String uuid2, String relation, String relationUuid, String currentTime, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Binds two graph nodes together with a specified relationship.

      Constructs a Cypher query to match two graph nodes by their UUIDs, update their update times, and create a relationship between them. Executes the Cypher query using the provided transaction.

      Specified by:
      bindGraphNodeToGraphNode in interface NodeMapper
      Parameters:
      uuid1 - the UUID of the first graph node
      uuid2 - the UUID of the second graph node
      relation - the name of the relationship to create
      relationUuid - the UUID of the relationship
      currentTime - the current timestamp for creation and update times
      tx - the Neo4j transaction to execute the Cypher query

    • updateNodeByUuid

      public void updateNodeByUuid(NodeUpdateDTO nodeUpdateDTO, String currentTime, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Updates a graph node by its UUID.

      Constructs a Cypher query to match a graph node by its UUID and update its properties. The query dynamically includes only the fields that need to be updated based on the provided properties. Executes the Cypher query using the provided transaction.

      Specified by:
      updateNodeByUuid in interface NodeMapper
      Parameters:
      nodeUpdateDTO - the DTO containing the updated properties of the node
      currentTime - the current timestamp for the update time
      tx - the Neo4j transaction to execute the Cypher query
